casebody.data:
Rodney MCKOWN, Appellant, v. Denis AGNIEL; Cranston Mitchell; Dick Moore, Appellees. No. 03-3656. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted Jan. 20, 2004. Decided Jan. 23, 2004. Rodney McKown, pro se, Cameron, MO, for Plaintiff-Appellant.

Before MELLOY, HANSEN, and COLLOTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Missouri inmate Rodney McKown appeals the district court’s1 denial of his motion to amend his complaint in a previously dismissed 42 U.S.C. § 1983 lawsuit. Having carefully reviewed the record, we conclude the district court did not abuse its discretion in denying the motion. Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47A(a).

. The Honorable Dean Whipple, Chief Judge, United States District Court for the Western District of Missouri.
